2018.09知识梳理

相似三角形

平行线分线段成比例定理

如图: AB∥CD∥EFAB \parallel CD \parallel EFAB∥CD∥EF 则有结论:

  • ACCE=BDDF\frac{AC}{CE} = \frac{BD}{DF}CEAC​=DFBD​

  • ACAE=BDBF\frac{AC}{AE} = \frac{BD}{BF}AEAC​=BFBD​

证明如下:

​ 连接AD,DE,BC,CFAD, DE, BC, CFAD,DE,BC,CF

​

​ ∵AB∥BC\because AB \parallel BC∵AB∥BC

​ ∴SΔACD=SΔBCD\therefore S_{\Delta ACD} = S_{\Delta BCD}∴SΔACD​=SΔBCD​

​ 同理SΔCDE=SΔCDFS_{\Delta CDE} = S_{\Delta CDF}SΔCDE​=SΔCDF​

​ ∴SΔACDSΔCED=SΔBCDSΔCDF\therefore \frac{S_{\Delta ACD}}{S_{\Delta CED}} = \frac{S_{\Delta BCD}}{S_{\Delta CDF}}∴SΔCED​SΔACD​​=SΔCDF​SΔBCD​​

​ SΔACDS_{\Delta ACD}SΔACD​与SΔCEDS_{\Delta CED}SΔCED​有着共同的高DP(DP⊥AE)DP(DP\perp AE)DP(DP⊥AE)

​ ∴SΔACDSΔCED=ACCE\therefore \frac{S_{\Delta ACD}}{S_{\Delta CED}} = \frac{AC}{CE}∴SΔCED​SΔACD​​=CEAC​

​ 同理SΔBCDSΔCFD=BDDF\frac{S_{\Delta BCD}}{S_{\Delta CFD}} = \frac{BD}{DF}SΔCFD​SΔBCD​​=DFBD​

​ ∴ACCE=BDDF\therefore \frac{AC}{CE} = \frac{BD}{DF}∴CEAC​=DFBD​

推论: 直线束定理

​

​ 在上图中: AB∥CDAB \parallel CDAB∥CD

​ 则有结论

  • OAOC=OBOD=OGOH\frac{OA}{OC} = \frac{OB}{OD} = \frac{OG}{OH}OCOA​=ODOB​=OHOG​
  • ABCD=BGDH=OAOC\frac{AB}{CD} = \frac{BG}{DH} = \frac{OA}{OC}CDAB​=DHBG​=OCOA​
  • ABCD=BGDH\frac{AB}{CD} = \frac{BG}{DH}CDAB​=DHBG​

推论: 平行于三角形一边的直线截三角形另两边所在的直线成比例

  1. 第一种形式

​ 如图, BC∥DEBC \parallel DEBC∥DE

​ 则有结论: ABAD=ACAE=BCDE\frac{AB}{AD} = \frac{AC}{AE} = \frac{BC}{DE}ADAB​=AEAC​=DEBC​

​ (即SΔABC∼SΔADE)(即S_{\Delta ABC} \sim S_{\Delta ADE})(即SΔABC​∼SΔADE​)

  1. 第二种形式

    此时仍有(1.)中的结论

例题:

如图, D为AB中点D为AB中点D为AB中点, 求证 BFCF=AEEC\frac{BF}{CF} = \frac{AE}{EC}CFBF​=ECAE​

证明:

如图, 作CG∥ABCG \parallel ABCG∥AB 交 DFDFDF 与GGG

∵AD∥CG\because AD \parallel CG∵AD∥CG

∴AEEC=ADGC\therefore \frac{AE}{EC} = \frac{AD}{GC}∴ECAE​=GCAD​

又∵BD∥CG\because BD \parallel CG∵BD∥CG

∴BFCF=BDGC\therefore \frac{BF}{CF} = \frac{BD}{GC}∴CFBF​=GCBD​

且AD=BDAD = BDAD=BD

∴BFCF=AEEC\therefore \frac{BF}{CF} = \frac{AE}{EC}∴CFBF​=ECAE​

例题:

如图, AB∥EF∥CDAB \parallel EF \parallel CDAB∥EF∥CD

求证1AB+1CD=1EF\frac{1}{AB}+\frac{1}{CD}=\frac{1}{EF}AB1​+CD1​=EF1​

证明：

∵EF∥AB\because EF \parallel AB∵EF∥AB

∴ΔABC∼ΔEFC\therefore \Delta ABC \sim \Delta EFC∴ΔABC∼ΔEFC

∴EFAB=CFBC\therefore \frac{EF}{AB}=\frac{CF}{BC}∴ABEF​=BCCF​

同理EFCD=BFBC\frac{EF}{CD}=\frac{BF}{BC}CDEF​=BCBF​

相加, 得

EFAB+EFCD=CF+BFBC\frac{EF}{AB}+\frac{EF}{CD}=\frac{CF+BF}{BC}ABEF​+CDEF​=BCCF+BF​

EFAB+EFCD=1\frac{EF}{AB}+\frac{EF}{CD}=1ABEF​+CDEF​=1

同时除以EFEFEF得

1AB+1CD=1EF\frac{1}{AB}+\frac{1}{CD}=\frac{1}{EF}AB1​+CD1​=EF1​

三角形重心分中线为1:21:21:2两部分

如图, D,F,ED, F, ED,F,E分别为BC,AB,ACBC, AB, ACBC,AB,AC的中点, 即,OOO为ΔABC\Delta ABCΔABC的重心

则有:

AOOD=BOOE=COOF=21\frac{AO}{OD} = \frac{BO}{OE} = \frac{CO}{OF} = \frac{2}{1}ODAO​=OEBO​=OFCO​=12​

证明如下:

​ 如图, 连接FEFEFE.

​

​ ∵AF=BF\because AF = BF∵AF=BF

​ 且AE=ECAE=ECAE=EC

​ ∴\therefore∴ FEFEFE为ΔABC\Delta ABCΔABC的中位线

​ ∴FEBC=12,FE∥BC\therefore \frac{FE}{BC} = \frac{1}{2}, FE \parallel BC∴BCFE​=21​,FE∥BC

​ ∴ΔFEO∼ΔCBO\therefore \Delta FEO \sim \Delta CBO∴ΔFEO∼ΔCBO

​ ∴COOF=21\therefore \frac{CO}{OF} = \frac{2}{1}∴OFCO​=12​

​ 同理可证:AOOD=BOOE=COOF=21\frac{AO}{OD} = \frac{BO}{OE} = \frac{CO}{OF} = \frac{2}{1}ODAO​=OEBO​=OFCO​=12​

思想: 通过中点作平行线构造中位线.

例题:

如图, DDD为BCBCBC的中点, ADADAD是ΔABC\Delta ABCΔABC的中线, FFF为ABABAB上任意一点, FCFCFC与ADADAD交于EEE.

求证:

AE×BF=2AF×DEAE \times BF = 2AF \times DEAE×BF=2AF×DE

思路: 看到常数项222想到可以凑出2AF2AF2AF或者2DE2DE2DE但是都不容易, 考虑把222移项, 转而凑出BF2\frac{BF}{2}2BF​, 此时我们可以通过作DG∥ABDG \parallel ABDG∥AB 构造中位线得到BF2\frac{BF}{2}2BF​

证明

作DG∥ABDG \parallel ABDG∥AB交CFCFCF于GGG

∵BD=DC\because BD=DC∵BD=DC

且BF∥DGBF \parallel DGBF∥DG

∴DG\therefore DG∴DG为ΔBCF\Delta BCFΔBCF的中位线

∴2DG=BF\therefore 2DG=BF∴2DG=BF

又AB∥DGAB \parallel DGAB∥DG

∴AEED=AFGD\therefore \frac{AE}{ED} = \frac{AF}{GD}∴EDAE​=GDAF​

∴AE×GD=AF×ED\therefore AE \times GD = AF \times ED∴AE×GD=AF×ED

其中AF=BF=2DGAF = BF = 2DGAF=BF=2DG

∴AE×BF2=AF×DE\therefore AE \times \frac{BF}{2} = AF \times DE∴AE×2BF​=AF×DE

即AE×BF=2AF×DEAE \times BF = 2AF \times DEAE×BF=2AF×DE

解法二

思路: 其实非要使用2DE2DE2DE也可以, 我们知道DDD是BCBCBC中点, 想到倍长中线, 使用倍长中线构造2DE2DE2DE

证明:

作ADADAD的延长线DHDHDH使DH=EDDH=EDDH=ED

连接BHBHBH

∵ED=DH\because ED = DH∵ED=DH

且∠EDC=∠BDH\angle EDC = \angle BDH∠EDC=∠BDH

且BD=DCBD=DCBD=DC

∴ΔBDH≅ΔCDE\therefore \Delta BDH \cong \Delta CDE∴ΔBDH≅ΔCDE

∴∠DBH=∠DCE\therefore \angle DBH = \angle DCE∴∠DBH=∠DCE

∴FE∥BH\therefore FE \parallel BH∴FE∥BH

∴AFFB=AEEH\therefore \frac{AF}{FB} = \frac{AE}{EH}∴FBAF​=EHAE​

∴AF×EH=AE×FB\therefore AF \times EH = AE \times FB∴AF×EH=AE×FB

其中EH=2EDEH = 2EDEH=2ED

∴AE×BF=2AF×DE\therefore AE \times BF = 2AF \times DE∴AE×BF=2AF×DE

例题: 如图:

D,ED,ED,E分别是BCBCBC的三等分点

FFF是ACACAC的中点

求BP:PQ:QFBP:PQ:QFBP:PQ:QF

思路, 使用相等条件证明线段的位置与数量关系

证明:

连接FEFEFE

∵AF=FC\because AF=FC∵AF=FC

且DE=ECDE=ECDE=EC

∴FE\therefore FE∴FE 为ΔADC\Delta ADCΔADC的中位线

∴FE∥AD\therefore FE \parallel AD∴FE∥AD

又BD=DEBD=DEBD=DE

∴PD\therefore PD∴PD为ΔBFE\Delta BFEΔBFE 的中位线

∴BP=PF\therefore BP=PF∴BP=PF

设PD=aPD=aPD=a

则FE=2aFE=2aFE=2a

∵AD∥EF\because AD \parallel EF∵AD∥EF

即ΔCEF∼ΔCDA\Delta CEF \sim \Delta CDAΔCEF∼ΔCDA

∴DCEC=ADEF\therefore \frac{DC}{EC} = \frac{AD}{EF}∴ECDC​=EFAD​

∴AD=DC×EFEC=2×EF=4a\therefore AD = \frac{DC \times EF}{EC} = 2 \times EF = 4a∴AD=ECDC×EF​=2×EF=4a

∴AP=3a\therefore AP=3a∴AP=3a

又FE∥ADFE \parallel ADFE∥AD

∴ΔFEQ∼ΔPQA\therefore \Delta FEQ \sim \Delta PQA∴ΔFEQ∼ΔPQA

∴PQQF=APFE=3a2a=32\therefore \frac{PQ}{QF} = \frac{AP}{FE} = \frac{3a}{2a} = \frac{3}{2}∴QFPQ​=FEAP​=2a3a​=23​

同时BP=PFBP=PFBP=PF

∴BP:PQ:QF=5:3:2\therefore BP:PQ:QF=5:3:2∴BP:PQ:QF=5:3:2

三角形角平分线定理

如图

ADADAD是ΔABC\Delta ABCΔABC的角平分线, 有结论

ABAC=BDDC\frac{AB}{AC} = \frac{BD}{DC}ACAB​=DCBD​

证明如下

例题:

已知ADADAD平分∠BAC\angle BAC∠BAC

求证ABAC=BDDC\frac{AB}{AC} = \frac{BD}{DC}ACAB​=DCBD​

方法一:

思路, 利用中点构造中位线解题

证明:

作DE∥ABDE \parallel ABDE∥AB交ACACAC于EEE

如图: ∵BD=DC\because BD=DC∵BD=DC

且DE∥ABDE \parallel ABDE∥AB

∴ED\therefore ED∴ED为ΔABC\Delta ABCΔABC的中位线

又∵∠BAD=∠DAC\because \angle BAD = \angle DAC∵∠BAD=∠DAC

且AB∥DEAB \parallel DEAB∥DE

∴∠BAD=∠EDA\therefore \angle BAD = \angle EDA∴∠BAD=∠EDA

∴∠ADE=∠DAE\therefore \angle ADE = \angle DAE∴∠ADE=∠DAE

∴AE=DE\therefore AE=DE∴AE=DE

且ΔCDE∼ΔCBA\Delta CDE \sim \Delta CBAΔCDE∼ΔCBA

∴BDDC=AEEC=DEEC=ABAC\therefore \frac{BD}{DC} = \frac{AE}{EC} = \frac{DE}{EC} =\frac{AB}{AC}∴DCBD​=ECAE​=ECDE​=ACAB​

解法2:

在三角形外作平行线, 证法类似1:

证明:

作CE∥ADCE \parallel ADCE∥AD交BABABA的延长线与点EEE

∵CE∥AD\because CE \parallel AD∵CE∥AD

∴ΔBAD∼ΔBEC\therefore \Delta BAD \sim \Delta BEC∴ΔBAD∼ΔBEC

∴∠BEC=∠BAD\therefore \angle BEC = \angle BAD∴∠BEC=∠BAD

而∠BAD=∠DAC\angle BAD = \angle DAC∠BAD=∠DAC

且∠DAC=∠ECA\angle DAC = \angle ECA∠DAC=∠ECA

∴∠AEC=∠ACE\therefore \angle AEC = \angle ACE∴∠AEC=∠ACE

∴AC=AE\therefore AC =AE∴AC=AE

∴BDDC=BAAE=BAAC\therefore \frac{BD}{DC} = \frac{BA}{AE} = \frac {BA}{AC}∴DCBD​=AEBA​=ACBA​

解法3:

思路: 等面积法, 通过作垂直利用角平分线上的点到角两边距离相等证明

证明:

作DF⊥ABDF \perp ABDF⊥AB于FFF, 作DE⊥ACDE\perp ACDE⊥AC于EEE

由DDD在BCBCBC上

SΔADBSΔADC=BDDC\frac{S_{\Delta ADB}}{S_{\Delta ADC}}= \frac{BD}{DC}SΔADC​SΔADB​​=DCBD​

又∵DF⊥AB\because DF \perp AB∵DF⊥AB DE⊥ACDE \perp ACDE⊥AC

且ADADAD平分∠BAC\angle BAC∠BAC

∴DF=DE\therefore DF = DE∴DF=DE

∴SΔADBSΔADC=AB×FDAC×DE=ABAC\therefore \frac{S_{\Delta ADB}}{S_{\Delta{ADC}}} = \frac{AB \times FD}{AC \times DE} = \frac{AB}{AC}∴SΔADC​SΔADB​​=AC×DEAB×FD​=ACAB​

∴SΔADBSΔADC=ABAC=BDDC\therefore \frac{S_{\Delta ADB}}{S_{\Delta ADC}} = \frac{AB}{AC} = \frac{BD}{DC}∴SΔADC​SΔADB​​=ACAB​=DCBD​

补充:

三角形外角平分线定理

如图

若AEAEAE是ΔABC\Delta ABCΔABC的外角平分线

则BEEC=ABAC\frac{BE}{EC} = \frac{AB}{AC}ECBE​=ACAB​

证明如下:

例题:

已知AEAEAE平分∠BAC\angle BAC∠BAC的补角

求证:BEEC=ABAC\frac{BE}{EC} = \frac{AB}{AC}ECBE​=ACAB​

证明:

作EF∥ACEF \parallel ACEF∥AC

∵AC∥EF\because AC \parallel EF∵AC∥EF

∴ΔBAC∼ΔBFE\therefore \Delta BAC \sim \Delta BFE∴ΔBAC∼ΔBFE

同时AC∥EFAC \parallel EFAC∥EF

∴∠CAE=∠AEF\therefore \angle CAE = \angle AEF∴∠CAE=∠AEF

且∠CAE=∠EAF\angle CAE = \angle EAF∠CAE=∠EAF

∴∠AEF=∠EAF\therefore \angle AEF = \angle EAF∴∠AEF=∠EAF

∴AF=FE\therefore AF = FE∴AF=FE

∴BEBC=BFAB=BFEF=BAAC\therefore \frac{BE}{BC} = \frac{BF}{AB} = \frac{BF}{EF} = \frac{BA}{AC}∴BCBE​=ABBF​=EFBF​=ACBA​

合分比性质

若ab=cd\frac{a}{b}=\frac{c}{d}ba​=dc​

则

  • ab+k=cd+k\frac{a}{b}+k=\frac{c}{d}+kba​+k=dc​+k
  • akb=ckd\frac{ak}{b}=\frac{ck}{d}bak​=dck​
  • a+cb+d=ab=cd\frac{a+c}{b+d}=\frac{a}{b}=\frac{c}{d}b+da+c​=ba​=dc​

黄金分割

如图, CCC在ABABAB上, 如果CCC满足:

ABAC=ACCB\frac{AB}{AC} =\frac{AC}{CB}ACAB​=CBAC​

则称CCC点是ABABAB的黄金分割点

例题:

已知在线段ABABAB上有一点CCC满足:

ABAC=ACCB\frac{AB}{AC} =\frac{AC}{CB}ACAB​=CBAC​

求ACCB\frac{AC}{CB}CBAC​

解:

设ABAC=ACCB=k\frac{AB}{AC} =\frac{AC}{CB}=kACAB​=CBAC​=k

AB=AC×kAB=AC\times kAB=AC×k

AC=AB×kAC = AB \times kAC=AB×k

AB=CB×k2AB = CB \times k^2AB=CB×k2

不妨设AB=1AB=1AB=1

则有AC+BC=ABAC+BC=ABAC+BC=AB

∴1k2+1k=1\therefore \frac{1}{k^2}+\frac{1}{k}=1∴k21​+k1​=1

∴k=2−1±1+4\therefore k=\frac{2}{-1\pm \sqrt{1+4}}∴k=−1±1+4​2​

其中k>0k > 0k>0

∴k=2−1+5=2×(5+1)4=5+12\therefore k=\frac{2}{-1+\sqrt5}=\frac{2\times (\sqrt5+1)}{4} = \frac{\sqrt5+1}{2}∴k=−1+5​2​=42×(5​+1)​=25​+1​

例题:

如图, 等腰三角形ABCABCABC中, AB=ACAB=ACAB=AC, ∠BAC=36∘\angle BAC=36^\circ∠BAC=36∘, DDD是ACACAC上一点, ∠CAD=36∘\angle CAD=36^\circ∠CAD=36∘

求证: DDD点黄金分割ACACAC

证明:

∠ABC=∠ACB=72∘\angle ABC=\angle ACB=72^\circ∠ABC=∠ACB=72∘

∠BDC=72∘\angle BDC = 72^\circ∠BDC=72∘

BC=BD=DABC=BD=DABC=BD=DA

∵∠A=∠DBC=36∘\because \angle A=\angle DBC=36^\circ∵∠A=∠DBC=36∘

且∠ACB=∠BCD\angle ACB=\angle BCD∠ACB=∠BCD

∴ΔABC∼ΔBCD\therefore \Delta ABC \sim \Delta BCD∴ΔABC∼ΔBCD

设BC=aBC=aBC=a

则BCDC=ABBC\frac{BC}{DC}=\frac{AB}{BC}DCBC​=BCAB​

∴AB=a2DC\therefore AB=\frac{a^2}{DC}∴AB=DCa2​

而AB=AC=AD+DCAB=AC=AD+DCAB=AC=AD+DC

∴a2=a×DC+DC2\therefore a^2=a \times DC+DC^2∴a2=a×DC+DC2

即aDC=a+DCa\frac{a}{DC}=\frac{a+DC}{a}DCa​=aa+DC​

所以DDD黄金分割ACACAC

射影定理

关于直角三角形的相似

如图, CD⊥ABCD\perp ABCD⊥AB,AC⊥CBAC \perp CBAC⊥CB则

ΔADC∼ΔCDB∼ΔACB\Delta ADC \sim \Delta CDB \sim \Delta ACBΔADC∼ΔCDB∼ΔACB

AC2=AD×ABAC^2=AD\times ABAC2=AD×AB

B\C2=DB×ABB\C^2=DB \times ABB\C2=DB×AB

CD2=DB×ADCD^2=DB\times ADCD2=DB×AD

证明:

∵∠A=90∘−∠ACD=∠DCB\because \angle A=90^\circ -\angle ACD = \angle DCB∵∠A=90∘−∠ACD=∠DCB

且∠ADC=∠CDB=90∘\angle ADC = \angle CDB = 90^\circ∠ADC=∠CDB=90∘

∴ΔCDB∼ΔADC\therefore \Delta CDB \sim \Delta ADC∴ΔCDB∼ΔADC

又∠CAB=∠DAC\angle CAB=\angle DAC∠CAB=∠DAC

且∠CDA=∠BCA\angle CDA=\angle BCA∠CDA=∠BCA

∴ΔADC∼ΔACB\therefore \Delta ADC \sim \Delta ACB∴ΔADC∼ΔACB

∴ACAD=ABAC\therefore \frac{AC}{AD}=\frac{AB}{AC}∴ADAC​=ACAB​

∴AC2=AB×AD\therefore AC^2=AB\times AD∴AC2=AB×AD

同理可证CB2=DB×ABCB^2=DB\times ABCB2=DB×AB

又有ΔCDB∼ΔADC\Delta CDB \sim \Delta ADCΔCDB∼ΔADC

∴ADCD=CDDB\therefore \frac{AD}{CD}=\frac{CD}{DB}∴CDAD​=DBCD​

∴CD2=AD×DB\therefore CD^2 = AD\times DB∴CD2=AD×DB

如图, ABBC=56\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{5}{6}BCAB​=65​, BC=6ECBC=6ECBC=6EC, 5FC=3CD5FC=3CD5FC=3CD, FG⊥AEFG \perp AEFG⊥AE于GGG,

求证: AG=4GEAG=4GEAG=4GE

解法一:

证明:

设AB=5aAB=5aAB=5a

则BC=AD=6aBC = AD=6aBC=AD=6a

BE=5a,EC=aBE=5a, EC=aBE=5a,EC=a

DF=2a,FC=3aDF=2a, FC=3aDF=2a,FC=3a

AF2=AD2+DF2=36a2+4a2=40a2AF^2=AD^2+DF^2 = 36a^2+4a^2=40a^2AF2=AD2+DF2=36a2+4a2=40a2

EF2=EC2+FC2=a2+9a2=10a2EF^2=EC^2+FC^2=a^2+9a^2=10a^2EF2=EC2+FC2=a2+9a2=10a2

AE2=AB2+BE2=25a2+25a2=50a2AE^2=AB^2+BE^2=25a^2+25a^2=50a^2AE2=AB2+BE2=25a2+25a2=50a2

∴AF2+EF2=AE2\therefore AF^2+EF^2=AE^2∴AF2+EF2=AE2

∴AF⊥EF\therefore AF \perp EF∴AF⊥EF

∴ΔAGF∼ΔFGE\therefore \Delta AGF \sim \Delta FGE∴ΔAGF∼ΔFGE

而AFEF=AF2EF2=2\frac{AF}{EF}=\sqrt{\frac{AF^2}{EF^2}}=2EFAF​=EF2AF2​​=2

∴AGAF=GFFE\therefore \frac{AG}{AF}= \frac{GF}{FE}∴AFAG​=FEGF​

∴AGGF=AFFE=2\therefore \frac{AG}{GF} = \frac{AF}{FE}=2∴GFAG​=FEAF​=2

同理GFGE=2\frac{GF}{GE}=2GEGF​=2

∴AGGF×GFGE=AGGE=2×2=4\therefore \frac{AG}{GF}\times \frac{GF}{GE}=\frac{AG}{GE}=2\times 2=4∴GFAG​×GEGF​=GEAG​=2×2=4

∴AG=4GE\therefore AG=4GE∴AG=4GE

解法2:

同1得到∠AFE=90∘\angle AFE=90^\circ∠AFE=90∘

由射影定理得

AF2EF2=AG×AEEG×AE=AGEG=41\frac{AF^2}{EF^2}=\frac{AG \times AE}{EG \times AE}=\frac{AG}{EG}=\frac{4}{1}EF2AF2​=EG×AEAG×AE​=EGAG​=14​

例题:

如图, BDBDBD平分∠ABC\angle ABC∠ABC, CDCDCD平分∠ACB\angle ACB∠ACB, AE=AFAE=AFAE=AF

求证EF2=4BE×CFEF^2=4BE\times CFEF2=4BE×CF

证明:

∵BD,CD\because BD, CD∵BD,CD交于DDD

∴AD\therefore AD∴AD平分∠BAC\angle BAC∠BAC

且AE=AFAE = AFAE=AF

∵∠AEF=180∘−∠BED\because \angle AEF = 180^\circ -\angle BED∵∠AEF=180∘−∠BED

∵∠EFA=180∘−∠CFD\because \angle EFA = 180^\circ -\angle CFD∵∠EFA=180∘−∠CFD

∴BE×CF=DF×ED=EF2×EF2=EF24\therefore BE \times CF = DF \times ED = \frac{EF}{2}\times \frac{EF}{2}=\frac{EF^2}{4}∴BE×CF=DF×ED=2EF​×2EF​=4EF2​

∴EF2=4BE×CF\therefore EF^2 = 4BE\times CF∴EF2=4BE×CF

反比例函数

函数的定义

两个变量, 每个自变量的取值对应且仅对应一个因变量的取值.

不是所有函数都有解析式!!!

初等函数

  • y=kx+by=kx+by=kx+b
  • y=kxy=\frac{k}{x}y=xk​
  • y=ax2+bx+cy=ax^2+bx+cy=ax2+bx+c

等

反比例函数的定义域

定义域: x≠0x \ne 0x̸​=0

值域: y≠0y \ne 0y̸​=0

反比例函数的图像

如图:

  • 是双曲线 (有两支)

  • 关于原点中心对称, 关于每个象限的角平分线(y=xy=xy=x与y=−xy=-xy=−x)对称

  • k>0k>0k>0时, 函数在一三象限

    k<0k<0k<0时, 函数在二三象限

  • k>0k>0k>0时, y随x的增大而减小

    k<0k<0k<0时, y随x的减小而增大

    前提条件: 在每个象限内!!!

  • ∣k∣\left|{k}\right|∣k∣越大, 图像越远离原点

  • 双曲线无限逼近坐标轴, 但并不相交

k的几何意义

如图S□ABOC=∣ab∣=∣k∣S_{\square ABOC} = \left| ab \right| = \left| k \right|S□ABOC​=∣ab∣=∣k∣

例题:

AOAB=23\frac{AO}{AB} = \frac{2}{3}ABAO​=32​, SΔBOD=32S_{\Delta BOD} = 32SΔBOD​=32

求y=kxy=\frac{k}{x}y=xk​

解:

作AE⊥OCAE \perp OCAE⊥OC于点EEE

∵AE⊥OC,BC⊥OC\because AE \perp OC, BC \perp OC∵AE⊥OC,BC⊥OC

∴AE∥BC\therefore AE \parallel BC∴AE∥BC

∴ΔOEA∼ΔOCB\therefore \Delta OEA \sim \Delta OCB∴ΔOEA∼ΔOCB

又有OAAB=23\frac{OA}{AB} = \frac{2}{3}ABOA​=32​

∴SΔOEASΔOCB=425\therefore \frac{S_{\Delta OEA}}{S_{\Delta OCB}} = \frac{4}{25}∴SΔOCB​SΔOEA​​=254​

∴SΔADB=SΔOAD+SΔADB=S□ADCE+SΔADB=S□ABCE\therefore S_{\Delta ADB} = S_{\Delta OAD} + S_{\Delta ADB} = S_{\square ADCE} + S_{\Delta ADB} = S_{\square ABCE}∴SΔADB​=SΔOAD​+SΔADB​=S□ADCE​+SΔADB​=S□ABCE​

∴SΔOEAS□ABCE=421\therefore \frac{S_{\Delta OEA}}{S_{\square ABCE}} = \frac{4}{21}∴S□ABCE​SΔOEA​​=214​

∴SΔOEA=S□ABCD×421=4\therefore S_{\Delta OEA} = S_{\square ABCD} \times \frac{4}{21} = 4∴SΔOEA​=S□ABCD​×214​=4

∴k=2×ΔOEA=8\therefore k = 2 \times \Delta OEA = 8∴k=2×ΔOEA=8

故而y=8xy = \frac{8}{x}y=x8​

SΔOEF=(4−k3)(3+k4)×12S_{\Delta OEF} = (4-\frac{k}{3})(3+\frac{k}{4})\times \frac{1}{2}SΔOEF​=(4−3k​)(3+4k​)×21​

SΔECF=(4−k3)(3−k4)×12S_{\Delta ECF} = (4-\frac{k}{3})(3-\frac{k}{4})\times \frac{1}{2}SΔECF​=(4−3k​)(3−4k​)×21​

S=k−k212=−112(k2−12k+36)+3=−112(k−6)2+3S = k - \frac{k^2}{12} = -\frac{1}{12}(k^2 - 12k + 36) + 3 = -\frac{1}{12}(k-6)^2 + 3S=k−12k2​=−121​(k2−12k+36)+3=−121​(k−6)2+3

当k=6k=6k=6时, SSS取得最小值为333

  • 下图中, 如果AAA为CECECE中点, 则BBB为CECECE中点
    • 扩展: EBBD=AECA\frac{EB}{BD} = \frac{AE}{CA}BDEB​=CAAE​

证明:

如图:

S□OFAC=S□ODBHS_{\square OFAC} = S_{\square ODBH}S□OFAC​=S□ODBH​

同时使用SODECS_{ODEC}SODEC​减去

得到S□HBEC=S□FDEAS_{\square HBEC} = S_{\square FDEA}S□HBEC​=S□FDEA​

S□HBECS_{\square HBEC}S□HBEC​与S□ODBHS_{\square ODBH}S□ODBH​有着相同的长

S□HBECS□ODBH=BEDB\frac{S_{\square HBEC}}{S_{\square ODBH}} = \frac{BE}{DB}S□ODBH​S□HBEC​​=DBBE​

同理S□FDEAS□OFAC=AECA\frac{S_{\square FDEA}}{S_{\square OFAC}} = \frac{AE}{CA}S□OFAC​S□FDEA​​=CAAE​

AECA=S□FDEAS□OFAC=S□HBECS□ODBH=BEDB\frac{AE}{CA} = \frac{S_{\square FDEA}}{S_{\square OFAC}} = \frac{S_{\square HBEC}}{S_{\square ODBH}} = \frac{BE}{DB}CAAE​=S□OFAC​S□FDEA​​=S□ODBH​S□HBEC​​=DBBE​

反比例图像与线段或其他图形相交的问题

边与坐标轴平行的直角三角形

例题:

如图A(1,4),B(4,1),C(4,4)A(1,4), B(4,1), C(4,4)A(1,4),B(4,1),C(4,4)

y=kxy=\frac{k}{x}y=xk​ 与三角形有焦点，求kkk的取值范围

函数经过A点时, k=4k=4k=4

函数经过B点时, k=4k=4k=4

函数经过C点时, k=16k=16k=16

{​k>4​k>4​k<16 \begin {cases} ​ k > 4 \\ ​ k > 4 \\ ​ k < 16 \end {cases}⎩⎪⎨⎪⎧​​k>4​k>4​k<16​

∴4<k<16\therefore 4 < k < 16∴4<k<16

总结:

  • 对于每个顶点求出反比例函数经过时kkk的取值
  • 联立不等式求解

线段

例题:

已知点A(1,2)A(1,2)A(1,2)点B(4,1)B(4,1)B(4,1), 若反比例函数y=nxy=\frac{n}{x}y=xn​的图像与线段ABABAB有公共点, 求nnn的取值范围

思路:考虑函数经过端点的情况和线段时函数的切线的情况

解答:

函数经过AAA点时, n=2n=2n=2

函数经过BBB点时, n=4n=4n=4

线段所在的直线是反比例函数的切线时

y=−13x+73y=-\frac{1}{3}x+\frac{7}{3}y=−31​x+37​ 与函数 y=nxy=\frac{n}{x}y=xn​有且仅有一个交点

x2−7x+3n=0x^2 - 7x + 3n = 0x2−7x+3n=0

Δ=49−4×3n=49−12n\Delta = 49 - 4 \times 3n = 49 - 12nΔ=49−4×3n=49−12n

Δ=0\Delta = 0Δ=0时, 两个函数有且仅有一个交点

n=4912n = \frac{49}{12}n=1249​

此时交点的横坐标1<72<41 < \frac{7}{2} < 41<27​<4, 在线段ABABAB上

有:

{n≤2n≤4n≥4912 \begin {cases} n \le 2 \\ n \le 4 \\ n \ge \frac{49}{12} \end {cases} ⎩⎪⎨⎪⎧​n≤2n≤4n≥1249​​

得到: 2≤n≤4912​2 \le n \le \frac{49}{12}​2≤n≤1249​​

总结: 对于线段来说

  • 取反比例函数经过两个端点时kkk的值
  • 取该线段所在的直线是反比例函数的切线时kkk的值 (条件: 交点在线段上)
  • 联立不等式, 求出kkk的取值范围

利用反比例函数的对称性

例题:

如图, 一次函数与反比例函数交于A,BA,BA,B, 与坐标轴交于M,NM,NM,N, A,BA,BA,B向坐标轴作垂线, 交坐标轴于C,D,E,FC,D,E,FC,D,E,F.

求证:

  • S□AEDK=S□CFBKS_{\square AEDK} = S_{\square CFBK}S□AEDK​=S□CFBK​
  • AN=BMAN = BMAN=BM

证明:

∵S□AEOC=S□BDOF=k\because S_{\square AEOC} = S_{\square BDOF} = k∵S□AEOC​=S□BDOF​=k

∴S□AEOC−S□DKCO=S□BDOF−S□DKCO\therefore S_{\square AEOC} - S_{\square DKCO} = S_{\square BDOF} - S_{\square DKCO}∴S□AEOC​−S□DKCO​=S□BDOF​−S□DKCO​

∴S□AEDK=S□BKCF\therefore S_{\square AEDK} = S_{\square BKCF}∴S□AEDK​=S□BKCF​

连接 DC,AD,BCDC, AD, BCDC,AD,BC

∵SΔADK=SΔBKC=S□AEDK2\because S_{\Delta ADK} = S_{\Delta BKC} = \frac{S_{\square AEDK}}{2}∵SΔADK​=SΔBKC​=2S□AEDK​​

∵SΔDKC=SΔDKC\because S_{\Delta DKC} = S_{\Delta DKC}∵SΔDKC​=SΔDKC​

∴SΔDCA=SΔDCB\therefore S_{\Delta DCA} = S_{\Delta DCB}∴SΔDCA​=SΔDCB​

∴DC∥AB\therefore DC \parallel AB∴DC∥AB

∴AC∥y轴\therefore AC \parallel y轴∴AC∥y轴

∴□ANDC为平行四边形\therefore \square ANDC为平行四边形∴□ANDC为平行四边形

同理□BMCD为平行四边形同理 \square BMCD为平行四边形同理□BMCD为平行四边形

∴DC=AN\therefore DC = AN∴DC=AN

∴DC=BM\therefore DC = BM∴DC=BM

∴AN=BM\therefore AN = BM∴AN=BM
